testcase.name: chromium › Employee attendance module functionality › 138 verify if any suitable day attendace status box is clicked and K-Sick leave is chosen, sick leave number changes
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to Dashboard with "english" language.......................passed Then click module button: "employee_attendance_btn".......................passed Then verify page Title "Employee Attendance" is visible...................passed Then I verify select month svg button is functional and I click it........passed When I click the chosen "December"........................................passed Then I see "December" becomes visible in select Box.......................passed Then I click year svg button..............................................passed When I click the "2024" in example........................................passed Then verify "2024" becomes visible in select Box..........................passed When I click the id filter................................................passed Then If fill with id nummer "125".........................................passed Then I see first row has data like below:.................................passed Then click edit button in first row of employee attendance page...........passed Then verify "Mehmet" "test_attendance" is seen as page title..............passed Then verify if,"3" is clickable...........................................passed Then click "3"............................................................passed Then choose letter "A" means sick leave and click and save changes........passed Then verify sick leave day is seen "0" before any edit in attendance in...passed Then click "3"............................................................passed Then choose letter "K" means sick leave and click and save changes........passed Then verify sick_leave_day is seen "1"....................................passed
